dr.evolution.parsimony
Class Parsimony

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.parsimony.Parsimony

public class Parsimony
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for doing parsimony reconstruction of patterns on a tree.

Version:
$Id: Parsimony.java,v 1.7 2005/06/27 21:18:40 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond

Constructor Detail

Parsimony

public Parsimony()
Method Detail

getParsimonySteps

public static int getParsimonySteps(Tree tree,
                                    PatternList patterns)
Calculates the minimum number of steps for the parsimony reconstruction of a a set of character patterns on a tree. This only does the first pass of the Fitch algorithm so it does not store ancestral state reconstructions. This makes it faster than the reconstructParsimonyStates method.

Parameters:
tree - a tree object to reconstruct the characters on
patterns - a PatternList object with any discrete datatype
Returns:
number of parsimony steps

reconstructParsimonyStates

public static void reconstructParsimonyStates(Tree tree,
                                              PatternList patterns)
Calculates the internal states using parsimony.

Parameters:
tree - a tree object to reconstruct the characters on
patterns - a PatternList object with any discrete datatype

getParsimonyState2

private static int[] getParsimonyState2(Tree tree,
                                        NodeRef node,
                                        PatternList patterns,
                                        int patternIndex,
                                        java.lang.String attributeName,
                                        int stateCount)
Reconstructs the state at a given node using parsimony. If the node is external then the actual state from patterns will be given.

Parameters:
tree - a Tree object to reconstruct the characters on
node - a NodeRef specifying the node
patterns - a PatternList object with any discrete datatype
Returns:
a boolean set of possible states

penalty

private static final int penalty(int state1,
                                 int state2)

getParsimonyState

private static boolean[] getParsimonyState(Tree tree,
                                           NodeRef node,
                                           PatternList patterns,
                                           int patternIndex,
                                           java.lang.String attributeName,
                                           int[] score)
Reconstructs the state at a given node using parsimony. If the node is external then the actual state from patterns will be given.

Parameters:
tree - a Tree object to reconstruct the characters on
node - a NodeRef specifying the node
patterns - a PatternList object with any discrete datatype
score - the current score passed by reference
Returns:
a boolean set of possible states
